name: Animal Stack Jump
description:
Animal Stack Jump is an amazing arcade game, where you have to jump with a cute cat-like creature in order to build the tallest tower possible.

Time your jumps perfectly, use the animal's wings to stay afloat in times of trouble and stack a block tower that your friends will envy when they look at the high-score leaderboards.

What are you waiting for? It's time to tap to the top! Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
